doc-draft.context:
You absolutely MUST use this new file template when generating the new topic:
<!DOCTYPE oxyTopic PUBLIC "OXY-PUB" "oxy-system"> <oxyTopic> <title></title> <body> </body> </oxyTopic>

instructions.draft-summary: Create a new topic which MUST match the template above. We have a new action "Format and Indent..." in the contextual menu of the project explorer.
